detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Calf-length skirt in pleated jersey with a sheen. Elasticated waist and a laser-cut edge at the hem. Unlined.
Fitted top in sturdy, stretch jersey with a square neckline. Long puff sleeves that are close-fitting at the cuffs and have gathers and pleats for added volume.
T-shirt in soft linen jersey with a round neckline and gently rounded hem.
Wide, cropped jersey T-shirt with a print motif on the front.

Soft, non-wired nursing bra in organic cotton jersey with adjustable shoulder straps and padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a lace trim at the hem. The cups are lined with fabric made from recycled polyester.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Regular fit.
Beret in a soft textured knit containing some mohair.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif and a ribbed trim around the neckline.

Jacket in cotton twill with sewn-on shoulder tabs, a thin hood that can be concealed in the stand-up collar and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Chest pockets, two flap patch pockets with a press-stud and two inner pockets. Drawstring at the waist and an adjustable press-stud fastening at the cuffs. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an appliqué on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.

Knee-length shirt dress in a linen and cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets, 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a detachable tie belt at the waist, and slits in the sides. Unlined.

Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long, cuffed sleeves, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Short-sleeved, printed jersey top.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Thin, heart-shaped earrings in metal. Size approx 5.5x6 cm.

Trousers in a wool weave with a regular waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners. Pockets in the side seams, welt back pockets and extra-long, straight legs with creases and a wide, sewn-in turn-up at the hems.
Biker jacket in soft suede with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with concealed press-studs. Zipped chest pocket, zipped side pockets, one inner pocket and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Baby Exclusive. Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Fitted, one-button jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Adjustable shoulder straps and no fasteners.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and a tie-front hem. Open chest pocket, buttoned cuffs and a yoke at the back.
Long, 5-pocket shorts in stretch twill with a regular waist, slightly lower crotch and zip fly and button.
Pyjamas with a jersey top and flannel bottoms. Top with a motif on the front and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Gently flared tulle skirt with a gathered, elasticated waist. Lined.
Long-sleeved shirt in a checked cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Short shorts in patterned lightweight sweatshirt fabric with wide covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and rounded hems.
Short sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband containing a concealed key pocket.
Shirt dress in soft viscose twill with a collar, button placket, long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Longer at the back. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif, round neckline, short sleeves and a rounded hem.
Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and skinny legs.
Joggers in jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, decorative buttons at the front, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Trousers in viscose jersey with an elasticated waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.

Chimi x H&M. We have teamed up with Chimi Eyewear to create three updated versions of the brand’s iconic sunglasses. This style has a square silhouette with flat lenses. The frames are made from high-quality cellulose acetate that is both BPA- and phthalate-free. The lenses have UV 400 filters for 100% UV-protection, and the sidepieces and front are connected with seven-barrel stainless steel hinges. Text print on the inside of one sidepiece. Supplied with a hard case, cleaning cloth and a drawstring bag. Available in three summery pastel shades as well as in stylish black. Total width 14.2 cm.
Knee-length dress in soft, patterned jersey with a square neckline, wrapover top and short puff sleeves with smocked trims. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
Set with a vest top and shorts in soft cotton jersey. Vest top with a decorative knot detail on each shoulder strap and a print motif. Shorts with side pockets and covered elastication at the waist.
Padded jacket with a detachable, lined hood, zip down the front, side pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with a knot detail.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and mesh-lined, triangular cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Elastic hem, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Jacket in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back. Wide elastic waistband.
Short seersucker top with a sweetheart neckline that has an opening and ties at the front. Short, raglan, puff sleeves that are elasticated top and bottom, and elastication at the back of the hem.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric. Slightly looser fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in lightweight jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the front and down one leg, short sleeves and short legs.
Soft, non-wired bra in microfibre with adjustable shoulder straps and padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Shorts in a softly draping viscose weave. High waist with pleats at the front and wide, covered elastication at the back, and diagonal side pockets.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.

Short, sleeveless dress in textured jersey with a V-neck and wrapover front and back. Frill trims around the armholes, at the neckline and at the back. Ties at the back of the neck and a seam at the waist with smocking at the back. Unlined.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, low crotch, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Dog jumper in a soft, fine, patterned knit containing some wool with a polo neck, ribbing around the front legs and openings for the back legs.
Fine-knit joggers with a soft, brushed finish, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Chinos in washed stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, and a fake welt pocket at the back.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Short, boxy blouse in a softly draping viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, short dolman sleeves and slits in the sides.
Chino shorts in washed cotton poplin with a zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Soft, cable-knit cardigan in a relaxed fit with a V-neck, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves.Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Octagonal sunglasses with metal frames, adjustable nose pads and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, motif on one back pocket and tapered legs.

Jacket knitted in soft, thermal fleece with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and kangaroo pockets. Jersey trim around the pockets, cuffs and hem. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
5-pocket shorts in sturdy cotton denim with hard-worn details. High waist, a zip fly and button and raw-edge hems. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neck and straight-cut hem.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with contrasting colour stripes down the sides, a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Shopper in braided paper straw with imitation leather details. One pair of longer and one pair of shorter handles. Unlined. Depth 20 cm. Height 32.5 cm. Width 58 cm.
Short dress in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a round neckline, long sleeves and side pockets. Unlined.
Belt in two rows of metal chain with a decorative buckle at the front. Adjustable length.
Ribbed jersey top with a round neckline decorated with plastic stones and long sleeves.
Jumper in a textured, premium cotton knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Lace underwired bra with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Pyjama bottoms in lightweight fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
